SEARCH
Package model

Class Project

java.lang.Object
model.Project
public class Project extends Object
The Project class represents a project that has several stages and a manager. Each project has a name, a client name, a client phone number, a budget, and start and end dates.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    posCurrentStage
    This variable is the index indicating the current stage

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String clientName, String clientPhone, double budget, String managerName, String managerPhone)
      Creates a new Project with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      clientName - the name of the client
      clientPhone - the phone number of the client
      budget - the budget for the project
      managerName - the name of the manager in charge of the project
      managerPhone - the phone number of the manager in charge of the project

    • setCurrentStage

      public String setCurrentStage()
      Sets the current stage of the project to the next stage in the sequence and updates the start and end dates of the stage accordingly.
      Returns:
      a message indicating the new project stage
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if there is an array overflow and the current stage is the last stage

    • setStartDate

      public void setStartDate()
      Sets the start date of the project to the current date and time.

    • setEndDate

      public void setEndDate(int projectDuration)
      Sets the end date of the project based on the given project duration and the start date of the project.
      Parameters:
      projectDuration - the duration of the project in months
